doc.title: 50/96 Snapspots (for Bruce)
doc.plot: Having shown us the dance of the photographing tourists in tausendjahrekino (1995), Kren shows us in snapshots uncountable visitors to Vienna, who are photographed by their neighbors as well as by Kren in front of the statue of Johann Straus jr., either individually, in families or in bus loads.

Having shown us the dance of the photographing tourists in tausendjahrekino (1995), Kren shows us in snapshots uncountable visitors to Vienna, who are photographed by their neighbors as well as by Kren in front of the statue of Johann Straus jr., either individually, in families or in bus loads.
